user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill my need for comfortable, stylish clothing that could be versatile for different occasions while also being mindful of quality and durability.
purchase_reason: I was drawn to the lightweight and soft fabric of the item, as well as its appealing color for the fall season. However, my confidence in the product was diminished due to concerns about its durability, especially after experiencing an immediate issue with the tag causing damage. This led me to question whether it would be a worthwhile addition to my wardrobe in the long run.

I was motivated to purchase this item due to its comfort and versatility, as well as the attractive price during a promotional event. The positive attributes of the fabric mix and flattering fit were significant factors in my decision, and I felt confident that it would meet my needs for both casual and layered outfits.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer clothing that is comfortable, well-fitting, and offers good coverage without being too tight or baggy. I value high-quality materials that are soft and durable, as well as consistent sizing that takes the guesswork out of shopping. I appreciate items that are versatile and can be worn for various occasions, whether casual or slightly dressy. Additionally, I tend to favor products that are easy to care for and maintain their shape after washing. On the other hand, I dislike items with inconsistent sizing, poor quality, or unflattering cuts that draw attention to areas I prefer to downplay. I also find heavy materials uncomfortable in warm weather and prefer styles that are not overly baggy or boxy.
